{"id":1475691923,"question_id":2891,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1733878043,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"51 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1475691923/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Beauty of an Array After Applying Operation","memory":"105.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximumBeauty(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int ans = 0;\n        int i=0;\n        for(int j=0; j<nums.size(); j++) {\n            while(nums[j]-nums[i]>2*k)\n                i++;\n            ans = max(ans, j-i+1);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-beauty-of-an-array-after-applying-operation","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
